column2: select AssetID = a.ID, TractID = t.ID , Miles = AVG (d.Miles) , dMiles = #* (MAX (d.Miles) -MIN (d.Miles) ) , Minutes = AVG (d.Minutes) , dMinutes = #* (MAX (d.Minutes) -MIN (d.Minutes) ) , Nway = count (*) from optw.tamass.ASSETS a join optw.ptheta.Portland1#Assets an on a.ID = an.ID join optw.ptheta.Portland1#Drive d on an.NodeID = d.OrigNodeID or an.NodeID = d.DestNodeID join optw.ptheta.Portland1#Tracts tn on tn.NodeID = d.OrigNodeID or tn.NodeID = d.DestNodeID join optw.tamass.TRACTS t on tn.ID = t.ID where an.NodeDist < @nodedistmax and tn.NodeDist < @nodedistmax and Minutes < # group by a.ID, t.ID
